meanings.definition: The area beside a grave where a burial takes place.
meanings.sent1: Families gather at the graveside to say their final goodbyes.
meanings.sent2: The mourners stood quietly at the graveside as the casket was lowered.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped softly near the graveside, as if paying their respects.
meanings.sent4: Memories lingered like shadows at the graveside, whispering tales of the past.
meanings.sent5: The sun cast a warm glow on the graveside, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The flowers were placed on the graveside stone, adding a touch of color.
meanings.sent2: The old oak tree provided shade to the graveside area, offering solace.
meanings.sent3: The moonlight bathed the graveside in a silver glow, painting a serene picture.
meanings.sent4: The silence of the graveside night was broken only by the rustling of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The wind whispered secrets to the graveside grass, sharing stories of the departed.
